author: Linus Torvalds
content: Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.

author: Michael A. Jackson
content: We follow two rules in the matter of optimization: Rule 1, Don't do it. Rule 2 (for experts only), Don't do it yet - that is, not until you have a perfectly clear and unoptimized solution.

author: Burt Rutan
content: Testing leads to failure, and failure leads to understanding.
